subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The young and talented Wildcats, criticized as underachievers for much of the season, continued to emphasize toughness as they overpowered Georgia and reached the SEC tournament final against Florida.
snippet: The young and talented Wildcats, criticized as underachievers for much of the season, continued to emphasize toughness as they overpowered Georgia and reached the SEC tournament final against Florida.
